content: lizzie is a hard-working teacher in the magical forest school her work is very fulfulling but it s also stressful when she s off work she likes to go rainbow-hunting whenever she sees a rainbow through the light rain and gray clouds her mood lifts as well giving her manes all the colors of the rainbow lizzie the unicorn pattern was first released in the book amigurumi fantasy 2 free version https //www mariskavos nl/free-unicorn-crochet-pattern/ skill level experienced size 10 / 26cm when made with sport weight yarn use a thicker yarn with a bigger needle to create a bigger unicorn
